summary: zoom-in zoom-out lag in osmdroid 3.0.6 jar

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Download tiles for a region using mobac for zoom-level 12-15 and copy in sd card 2. use zoom in starting from level 12 3. use zoom out starting from level 15 What is the expected output? What do you see instead? expected output: smooth zooming capability actual result: lagging zoom-in zoom-out, sometimes blank tiles(while zooming out) despite tiles being on the sd card What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 3.0.6 jar Fedora 12 (emulator) , Android 2.1.1 (device) Please provide any additional information below. tested on device as well as emulator It seems center tile does not zoom in as expected Once it is out of focus (i.e user goes to a different location) , the tiles appear to have positioned properly without any lag/distortion
How is this different to issue 289?
@neilboyd: yes its kind of similar to issue 289 , but this refers to offline mode..happened to see issue 289 after reporting this
